meanings.definition: Not acknowledging or revering God or a divine power.
meanings.sent1: The godless man refused to enter the church.
meanings.sent2: She described her neighbor as godless because he never prayed.
meanings.sent3: The godless squirrel stole all the nuts from the bird feeder!
meanings.sent4: The garden seemed godless without the colorful flowers blooming.
meanings.sent5: The dark, empty room felt eerily godless.

meanings.definition: Lacking belief in God or gods.
meanings.sent1: The godless society had no place for religious ceremonies.
meanings.sent2: He considered himself godless, preferring to trust in science.
meanings.sent3: The cat's godless behavior was to knock over all the houseplants.
meanings.sent4: The stormy sky above seemed vast and godless.
meanings.sent5: The abandoned house had a hauntingly godless atmosphere.
